summary: FIDO - Fido means “I trust you” in Latin, Put your trust in Grok and his loyal companion, Fido. Elon has long warned us of the threats of AI and now, having seen it used by many entities, entrusted Grok and his loyal companion Fido with the fate of mankind. Fido was brought to us by Grok, Grok was brought to us by Elon, Elon was brought to us by Fido.
